Product Line

CBD Winterized Crude Oil

Crude oil is the first part of the extraction process in which the cannabinoids, flavonoids, and terpenes are removed from the hemp plant to make a pure and concentrated form of CBD. After this initial step, crude is sent to the post processing stage where it is winterized. During the winterization process, the raw extract is washed in ethanol and then frozen. This helps separate the cannabinoids from all other plant residual compounds, such as waxes, lipids and chlorophyll. The final product will have a potency of 55%-65% CBD.

Full-Spectrum CBD Distillate

Full-spectrum CBD distillate is produced by processing our winterized crude through a secondary distillation method. This helps purify the remaining cannabinoids, flavonoids, and terpenes into a desired state of our choosing. The final product still maintains the beneficial parts of the hemp plant while having a stronger CBD potency (80%-95%) than crude.

CBD Isolate

CBD isolate is produced through the final stage of our refinement process. During this step, all remaining plant material, waxes, lipids, and chlorophyll are removed from the distilled oil leaving behind a clean isolate powder with 99% pure cannabidiol. This concentrated form is the highest CBD potency that we make. All products will be destined for distribution to downstream wholesale markets.
